snippet: Simon & Schuster created the site, offtheshelf.com, to inform readers about books they may have missed.
abstract: Simon & Schuster creates website called offtheshelf.com to drive readers to discover books they may have missed; site includes reviews, interviews and articles about books that are at least one year old.
lead_paragraph: Simon & Schuster created the site, offtheshelf.com, to inform readers about books they may have missed.

headline.print_headline: New Website for Books at Least a Year Old
headline.main: New Website for Books at Least a Year Old
